trends: There has been one other sighting in Shelocta
There were no other sightings in Shelocta on or around November 12th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw VERY bright white ball of light pass very fast in front of me while driving on 422 aroud the Shelocta area. Passed horizontally in front of me for maybe 4 seconds across the sky, then vanished as if the light had just dissapeared or shut off. Not a cloud in the sky to duck behind. NOT a shooting star, or a plane, helicopter, etc. Never have seen anything like this before.
